member.name: T:Sitecore.XConnect.Service.Plugins.Processing.ContactProcessingPlugin
member.summary: Implements an XConnect plugin that queues up contacts for processing.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A of object that represents the contact processing pool to use to queue up items.
A object that provides logging capabilities, or null if logging is not required.

member.summary: Releases managed and unmanaged resources used by the current class instance.

member.summary: Subscribes to events the current plugin listens to.
member.param: A object that provides access to the configuration settings.

member.name: M:Sitecore.XConnect.Service.Plugins.Processing.ContactProcessingPlugin.Unregister
member.summary: Unsubscribes from events the current plugin listens to.

member.summary: Releases managed and unmanaged resources used by the current class instance.
member.param: Indicates whether the current method was called from explicitly or implicitly during finalization.

member.summary: Handles the event that is generated when a batch operation completes.

member.name: M:Sitecore.XConnect.Service.Plugins.Processing.ContactProcessingPlugin.CreateContactWorkItem(System.Guid,Sitecore.XConnect.Operations.XdbOperationType)
member.summary: Creates a contact work item that is ready to be added to the processing pool.
member.param: A value that is the unique identifier of the contact.
A value that indicates why the item is created.
member.returns: A of object that is ready to be added to a processing pool.
